block.p: Katherine Anne Rosenbach, a daughter of Patricia and Robert J. Rosenbach of San Antonio, was married yesterday to Michael Francis York, a son of Patricia and Howard A. York of Greenwich, Conn. The Rev. Thomas F. O'Meara performed the ceremony in the Basilica of the Sacred Heart at the University of Notre Dame in Notre Dame, Ind.
The couple graduated from Notre Dame.

Katherine Anne Rosenbach, a daughter of Patricia and Robert J. Rosenbach of San Antonio, was married yesterday to Michael Francis York, a son of Patricia and Howard A. York of Greenwich, Conn. The Rev. Thomas F. O'Meara performed the ceremony in the Basilica of the Sacred Heart at the University of Notre Dame in Notre Dame, Ind.
The couple graduated from Notre Dame.

Mrs. York, 25, is a sales manager in the Chicago office of Continental Airlines. Her father is a partner in Clemens & Spencer, a law firm in San Antonio. Her mother is a special education teacher at John Marshall High School in San Antonio.

Mr. York, 30, is an associate for sales and trading at Goldman, Sachs & Company in Chicago. He received an M.B.A. degree from the University of Michigan. His mother retired as a special education teacher at Newington (Conn.) Children's Hospital. His father, also retired, was the president of Capmac Investment Management, which was in New York.
